moves.9. Qc2 Bg4 10. Nxe5: White goes for my pawn forgetting that my knight is ready to revenge kill
moves.14... O-O-O 15. g4 h5 16. h3 g6: I accidentally leave my knight unprotected but the Queen is the only thing preventing a checkmate by Black
moves.17... Qd2#: White king is trapped on the f row by the bishop. I think White's mistake in this game was that he was focused simply on taking pieces rather than looking at the overall picture.
